title: I'm Amazed At How OP Galio is vs DotS
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2102348996/31777445

Tanked like a Boss. CC like a Boss. Save allies like a Boss.

The one time I finally got Mid, Team was so ahead 4v5, if that Darius didn't do the old "1v5 the enemy team nonstop while claiming to do so so that team can pressure when team was at base" where you never group, we would have won too easily. Other two times I've lost with Galio, I was still able to stall the game as Galio Support and we had a Master Yi purposefully throw the game as well back when Brand Support was a thing.

Now you can argue my build doesn't allow for much damage, but that is my playstyle with him or almost any champion. I prefer helping others grow and don't mind being KS even when I play ADC.

Remember guys. Over 8k gold lead for over 10minutes. That's how hard your team mates have to throw when you're playing Galio - the Guardian Pedo Stalker Sentinel of Damacia.
